res: Let $D_n$ be the determinant of the $n$ by $n$ matrix whose value in the $i$th row and $j$th column is $|i-j|$. Show that $D_n = (-1)^{n-1} * (n-1) * (2^{n-2}).$
Translating: Let $D_n$ be the determinant of the $n$ by $n$ matrix whose value in the $i$th row and $j$th column is $|i-j|$. Show that $D_n = (-1)^{n-1} * (n-1) * (2^{n-2}).$

allElaborated: ∀ {n : ℕ}, ∃ (A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℤ), (∀ i j, A i j = |↑i - ↑j|) → Matrix.det A = (-1) ^ (n - 1) * (n - 1) * 2 ^ (n - 2)
